queries.clientAvails: select timestamp, round(sum(status)*100/count(status)) as status, group_concat(case when status=0 then logid end) as additional_status from logs where timestamp > $from and timestamp < $to group by round(strftime('%s',timestamp)/$timeStep)
queries.clientAvailsBanner: select cast(sum(status) as float)*100/count(status) as percent from logs where timestamp > $from and timestamp < $to
